appCatchphrase.noStyle: Trusted short links from education institutions

appDescription.subtitle: $t(general.appTitle) short links can only be created by education officers, so you can be sure itâ€™s from a trustworthy source.

antiPhishing.description: Shorten your links with a trustworthy $t(general.emailDomain) domain, so your users know they are from an education officer.

customised.description: Long URLs are hard to remember and take up space. Create and share short links instead.

analytics.description: Want to know how popular your links are? Track each link's click rate through our web interface.

fileSharing.description: Upload your file to share it with anyone, using a customised and trustworthy $t(general.emailDomain) short link.

login.whitelistPhrase: Only available for use by $t(general.officerType) with an email from $t(general.emailDomain).
